title: Postmark - Message Streams Activity
description: This dashboard provides insights into events that track the status and engagement of emails for both Transactional and Broadcast streams, including delivery, opens, clicks, and bounces.

definition.content:
[Postmark](https://postmarkapp.com/) is an email delivery service for sending and tracking application emails, offering a scalable alternative to traditional SMTP. 

Gain better visibility into your message streams performance by monitoring Postmark message streams activity logs with this dashboard.

For more information, see the [Postmark Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/postmark).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Event Trends: Spams, Bounces, and Unsubscribes
